entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 3.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Muskoka Airport 10:00 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 3.7°C
Pressure: 99.4 kPa
Visibility: 11.3 km
Humidity: 96 %
Dewpoint: 3.1°C
Wind: SSE 24 km/h gust 35 km/h

entry.title: Friday: Periods of rain. High 6.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending late this afternoon then cloudy. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 40 gusting to 60 late this afternoon. High 6. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few flurries. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning overnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries at times heavy. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy with risk of snow squalls. Blowing snow. Local amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023
